definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The debate on whether to ban flour brightener has been going on for several years.
sentences.chinese: 關於麪粉增白劑存廢的爭論已經進行了數年。

sentences.english: Benzoyl peroxide and calcium peroxide, 2 flour additives that are commonly used to "bleach" food, are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 麪粉增白劑過氧化苯甲酰和過氧化鈣全面禁用。

sentences.english: Know-how of plastic using optical brightening agent and market survey report for plastic chemical products.
sentences.chinese: 塑料用增白劑產品資料及塑料化學品市場調研。

sentences.english: There must be brighteners in the steamed bread, which are bad for your health.
sentences.chinese: 這種饅頭肯定加了增白劑，吃了對身體有害。

sentences.english: This website is going to be submitted to the fwa award and other 5 online awards.
sentences.chinese: 這個網站將要提交給熒光增白劑獎等5聯機獎項。
